name: Simple Shooter (Calae)
description:
Hello! My name is Calae and I am learning UE5. I am following a course on GameDev.tv, linked here. This is the final project of five. After this, it's finally time to make something on my own!

In this game, you are an agent sent to kill everyone else within a facility. Can you dispose of them all before they dispose of you?

Controls:

  • WASD: Move around
  • Space Bar: Jump
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Click: Fire
  • Escape: Quit game

Good luck!
